metadata.title: CVE-2021-22211 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 13.7. GitLab Dependency Proxy, under certain circumstances,can impersonate a user resulting in possibly incorrect access handling.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
